message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss a price of $140?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was hoping we could get closer to my target price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $135?
I understand you're getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $137.50?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit short of my target price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $132?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit short of my target price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $131?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit short of my target price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $129?
